tags.cf-questions: A little bit about myself&&I graduated from the University of Michigan Ann Arbor with a major in Computer Science and minor in Physics && In my free time I love to learn more about CS concepts, surf, make music and take photos, specifically film photos&&You can view my film photos on Flickr&&You can also see all my open-source projects on GitHub&&If you would like to talk to me my email is chrisvensand@gmail.com
